resources:
Examer
Device\'s date time/time zone is set manually. open settings You cannot take tests if the device\'s date/time or time zone is set manually. Please change the setting by navigating to the settings app.
Email Address Password By clicking below, you agree to our Terms of Use and consent to our Privacy Policy. A network error occurred. Log in Start test
Welcome to Examer Take tests online Examer is a platform that allows you to take online tests right from your phone.
Reduce eye strain with dark mode Want to dim the lights? Don\'t let a bright screen mess with your eyes.If you are running Android 10 or above, you can turn on dark mode to reduce eye strain and save battery.
Taking tests have never been easier Scheduled tests automatically appear on the home screen. Just click on the scheduled test to start taking the test.
Create account
Log in with mail The email address or password that you\'ve entered is incorrect. Please check the credentials.
] Please enter a valid email. The password must be of length 8, and must contain atleast one uppercase and lowercase letter and atleast one digit. A user with the same email already exists. Please enter a valid email and password. A password is valid if, and only if,it is of length 8 , contains atleast one uppercase and lowercase letter and contains atleast one digit. Sign up for a new account First Name Last Name Sign up
Test Description Total number of questions minutes
Upcoming tests
The test has expired The window for taking the has closed.The test has expired.You can close this dialog by clicking on the \'close\' button at the bottom of the dialog. close "This test is not open yet. You can start attempting the test from the scheduled time."
Test history Review Test
Sign out
Sign Out Cancel Are you sure you want to sign out? You will be logged out of your account. You can log back in using your email and password.
Scheduled Tests Test History Profile
Edit profile picture Name Save Enter the new %1$s Updated Successfully Unable to update.A network error occurred.
"The new %1$s is same as the old %1$s"
Listen to the audio file and answer the questions in the workbook. No of repeats left: %1$s Go to work book Workbook %1$s/%2$s
You are about to start the test. Please ensure that : \n\n * The device has sufficient battery.\n * Do not disturb is turned on.\n * You have a stable internet connection.\n * Any scheduled alarms are turned off.
Question No: %1$s Marks: %1$s Next workbook Finish Test
Are you sure you want to exit the test? Once you exit the test, you won\'t be able to take the test again. The answers submitted for previous workbooks will be saved. Quit You are not allowed to leave this screen while taking the test. The test will be ended when you leave this screen. The test has timed out. The answers submitted for previous workbooks have been saved. You can leave this screen now. Are you sure you want to end the test? You cannot return back to the test after the test has ended. End test
